She looked at Brix and smirked, "Gee, thanks.  So Soot and ash is my 
color huh?"  She looked down at herself and chuckled. "Heh, guess 
so." She tried again brush some of it off, but it just stuck to her 
and smeared around making an even bigger mess. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Brix, in the smae room as Spears,, heard the panel crashing. When 
he 
> truned to look at her, she was all covered in dirt and grime. Brix 
> just simled and laughed.
> 
> "Hahahaha! It looks good on you! Hahahaha!"
> 
> He went back to repairing the CR Chambers.
